name: Wall Street Online
description:
Wall Street Online is the most complete game simulation to play as a Broker!!
You can use this app as educational for free or play it to understand how the
stock world moves.

How to play:
You will receive 5000 GGCoins on the first launch.
Now you can start to see news about stocks, buy stocks, sell and buy from users marketplace.
With push notifications you will be always updated on when you will sell your stocks.

There is also a continuos BONUS time that will gift some GGCoins in some hours.

Features :
- Background image auto rotation
- Preferred stock info following
- Real news
- Real stocks
- Users Marketplace
- Your Portfolio
- Brokers World Map
- Great Chat with ignore list
- Voice Assistant
- Great graphic with candlebar and variations for days, months
- 80's and retro games radio streaming to feel in the golden age

Tips :
- Change radio streaming pressing on the music icon on the status bar
- Choose a stock and press "Follow" to change the stock info following
